name: The Glitch Prison
description:
.
This game is a single player escape adventure game.
You are a prisoner who has been trapped in this prison for a long time.
But you have noticed some bugs in the world and you have decided to use them to escape from prison.
Now is the time to break out!

Game Overview.
The goal of the game is to verify various bugs and break out of a small prison.
Manipulate objects that can physically interfere, transparent walls, and uncomfortable behavior to achieve the fastest jailbreak possible.

Play Time.
30 minutes to 1 hour

b]Controls[/b][/b

Camera:Mouse
Move:WASD
Jump: Space
Interact:E
FPS/TPS:V
Move object:Drag&Drop
Crouch:Ctrl
Flash light:F
Wave:H
Restart:P
Rolling:Alt
Game Menu:Tab
Main Menu:Esc

There are no restrictions on video streaming.
